text:
September 26# 1941
Mr. M. S. Novik
Radio station wnyc
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City# New York
Dear Novik;
This is a general reminder that you are going to
FURNISH ME WITH AN ACCOUNT OF WHAT WNYC IS DOING
on the National Defense front# This article is
to run in the October I News Letter.
Yes, I know the Septemer 15 Letter is late.
Cordially#
Frank E. Schooley# WILL
Executive Secreiiry
FESjSL
